Laser (ipg)

Contains logic for interacting with IPG Lasers

Functions
EnterReadyState
call Laser.EnterReadyState();

Transition the laser to a ready state

ExitReadyState
call Laser.ExitReadyState();

Transition the laser away from a ready state

Fire
call Laser.Fire();

Signal the laser to begin emission

SelectChannel
call Laser.Selectchannel(
intChannel
);

Select the laser beam switch channel number

Parameters
intChannel

the channel to select

TurnOnPulseMode
call Laser.TurnOnPulseMode();

Turn on laser's pulse mode

See Also

  • Laser.SetPulseWidth

TurnOffPulseMode
call Laser.TurnOffPulseMode();

Turn off laser's pulse mode

See Also

  • Laser.SetPulseWidth

TurnOnLaser
call Laser.TurnOnLaser();

Turn on beam

TurnOffLaser
call Laser.TurnOffLaser();

Turns off laser's beam

TurnOnAnalogControl
call Laser.TurnOnAnalogControl();

Enable analog control

TurnOffAnalogControl
call Laser.TurnOffAnalogControl();

Disable analog control

TurnOnGuideBeam
call Laser.TurnOnGuideBeam();

Enable guide beam

TurnOffGuideBeam
call Laser.TurnOffGuideBeam();

Disable guide beam

SetSingleShotMode
call Laser.SetSingleShotMode();

Set the laser's firing mode to "Single Shot". When in this mode, the laser will shoot one 0.1 second burst.

SetTimeBasedMode
call Laser.SetTimeBasedMode();

Set the laser's firing mode to fire at a timimg frequency. When in this mode, the laser will shoot based on the set frequency

See Also

  • Laser.SetFrequency

SetDistanceBasedMode
call Laser.SetDistanceBasedMode();

Set the laser's firing mode to fire based on distance. When in this mode, the laser will shoot at a set distance interval

TurnEmissionOn
call Laser.TurnEmissionOn();

Start firing the laser based on the current firing mode

TurnEmissionOff
call Laser.TurnEmissionOff();

Stops the laser firing

SetSyncInputHigh

Set the laser synchronous input to HIGH

SetSyncInputLow
call Laser.SetSyncInputLow();

Set the laser synchronous input to LOW

StartProgram
call Laser.StartProgram();

Start the currently-selected laser program

See Also

  • Laser.SelectProgram

  • Laser.StopProgram

  • Laser.GetTargetProgram

StopProgram
call Laser.StopProgram();

Stop the currently-selected laser program

See Also

  • Laser.StartProgram

  • Laser.GetTargetProgram

GetTargetProgram
call Laser.GetTargetProgram(
&intProgramNumber
);

Get the currently selected program

Parameters
&intProgramNumber

a return variable to store the selected program.

See Also

  • Laser.SelectProgram

SelectProgram
call Laser.SelectProgram(
intProgramNumber
);

Select a laser program

Parameters
intProgramNumber

the program to select

See Also

  • Laser.GetTargetProgram

SetFrequency
call Laser.SetFrequency(
intFreq
);

Set the laser frequency

Parameters
intFreq

the target laser frequency in Hz (as an integer)

SetPeakPower
call Laser.SetPeakPower(
intMaxPowerDesired
);

Set the desired max power

Parameters
intMaxPowerDesired

the desired max power (as an integer)

SetPower
call Laser.SetPower(
peakPower
);

Set the desired power

Parameters
peakPower

the desired target power

SetPulseWidth
call Laser.SetPulseWidth(
intPulseDuration
);

Set the desired pulse width (in ms)

Parameters
intPulseDuration

the desired pulse width in ms

StartMaxShotTimer
call Laser.StartMaxShotTimer();

Start the max shot timer, such that after the set time elapses, the laser will stop firing

See Also

  • Laser.SetMaxShotTime

SetMaxShotTime
call Laser.SetMaxShotTime(
timeAllowedInSeconds
);

Set the maximum time that the laser will shoot for

See Also

  • Laser.StartMaxShotTimer

Parameters
timeAllowedInSeconds

The maximum shooting time, in seconds
